column4: is it possible to install ubuntu from within ubuntu (as alternate OS)?
no, I can't use a virtual machine ... some of my hardware isn't supported in Jaunty and I want to check if it gets better with Karmic
is a umpc and I have no USB CD at hand ;-)
well I'll put it on a USB stick then and go from there
just wanted to know if it was possible to install Ubuntu from Ubuntu ;-)
you can't do that, you'll break the linux and it will never work again for anyone :)
